name: Retro Comecocos
description:
Retro Comecocos is a classic maze arcade you played when you were a child. Avoid the ghosts and get all the stars to move to the next level:
- It has three different screen pad configurations, to play easier and confortable.
- Support Google Games, leaderboard and achievements.
- Nine different mazes.
- Simulation of old CRT screens like the arcades of the 80s.
- Extra life at 5000 and every 10000 points. Additional points each time you eat a ghost.
If you like retro games, you'll be fascinated by Retro Comecocos
